data.message: Total waste of time, constantly asking me to log in, and thats it, dont even get chance to enter the code

replies.message: Hi Karl, the promotion has a daily prize draw, you are requested to either log in or register an account before entering your codes. If you need any more help please call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1) 9am - 6pm. Thanks

Hi. I have a account. But like i said it just keeps telling me to log in. Which i do. Then it says log in again. Keep going round in circles. Waste of time. If u read social media loads of people are have similar or same probs as me.   Now guna throw code away and delete this from facebook. Waste of time
